comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I wonder if this is the Messageries Maritimes Steamer LE SYDNEY (1882). Trouble is there were seven identical sister ships! - MELBOURNE, CALEDONIEN, SALAZIE, OCEANIEN, YARRA, and NATAL. Hmmm! www.messageries-maritimes.org/sydney.htm ; www.messageries-maritimes.org/avant18.htm

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] That'd be right. Now where's that barcoding system for historic ships that Quasymody suggested...
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
